key_responsibilities: work with the Chief Counsel/Legislative Director and with the Chief of Staff to develop and implement the Member’s legislative strategy in his/her issue areas
prepare materials for hearings
draft legislation, amendments, and congressional record statements
conduct research
managing and handling issues that include but are not limited to Federal-District of Columbia issues, Federal Workforce, U.S. Postal Service and Labor policy
requirements: highly energetic, motivated and organized lawyer with strong interpersonal and writing skills
able to manage multiple tasks and work well under pressure
ability to write well under tight deadlines
able to handle multiple tasks and issues effectively while meeting deadlines
results-oriented problem solver and motivated self-starter who can think outside the box
Prior Hill, law firm or similar experience is preferred
law degree
be, or be willing to become, a resident of the District of Columbia
salary: based on skill and experience level

key_responsibilities: Serve as the Congressman’s liaison with the community, local organizations and government agencies
staff and/or represent the Congressman at events
advise the Congressman on local issues
help organize community based meetings and events
implement proactive constituent outreach programs
prepare Member for speeches and meetings
draft correspondence
requirements: Prefer two years experience working directly with the community at large
Familiarity with the 34th Congressional District, key federal, state and local issues, and the governmental process is also desirable
Solid interpersonal, research and writing skills are essential
team player
positive attitude and the ability to work and set priorities in a fast-paced and challenging environment
Spanish language skills considered a plus
salary: Commensurate with experience and salary history

key_responsibilities: develop and implement an aggressive media plan
manage staff and entire media portfolio
Significant speech writing
press statements, social media, op-eds, floor remarks, and keynote speeches
requirements: proven track record with local and national media
3-5 years of previous experience
Outstanding writing skills

key_responsibilities: develop and implement a strategic media plan
manage robust digital media portfolio
utilize aggressive pitching strategies
press statements, social media, op-eds, floor remarks, and keynote speeches
requirements: proven track record with national media and ethnic press
Outstanding writing skills for varying mediums
Understanding of key policy areas, including poverty, foreign affairs, and HIV/AIDS
